title: 251: Best Rate to Gain or Lose Weight, Training a Tight Muscle, Entheogens & Fitness & MORE!
description: Sal, Adam & Justin answer your questions about the best rate to gain/lose weight as you bulk/cut, whether women’s training & diet should change throughout the month as hormones change, whether to work strong & tight glutes or skip training them, if they see a place in the future where entheogens are used for fitness and what citizenship they would choose other than a U.S. one. Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Learn more about Mind Pump at www.mindpumpmedia.com
